channel.title: AMS Council Agenda Feed
channel.description: A feed that parses the agendas for AMS Council

item.title: Council Agenda – June 11, 2025 at 6:00 pm
item.content:encoded:
AMS Council Meeting

Alma Mater Society of UBC Vancouver

Wednesday, June 11, 2025 at 6:00 PM PDT to Wednesday, June 11, 2025 at 10:00 PM

PDT

Michael Kingsmill Forum + Zoom for Councillors (must be pre-arranged with the President): https://ubc.zoom.us/j/65767384039?pwd=CEC1XsJSClCzVvnEkYeIMaAvhBaPXK.1

Meeting Details: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/65767384039?pwd=CEC1XsJSClCzVvnEkYeIMaAvhBaPXK.1

Meeting ID: 657 6738 4039

Passcode: 742580

Additional Meeting Details: Topic: AMS Council | June Meeting

Time: Jun 11, 2025 18:00 Vancouver

Join Zoom Meeting: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/65767384039?pwd=CEC1XsJSClCzVvnEkYeIMaAvhBaPXK.1

Meeting ID: 657 6738 4039

Passcode: 742580

One tap mobile:

+17789072071,,65767384039#,,,,,,0#,,742580#

Dial by your location:

+1 613 209 3054 (Vancouver)

+1 778 907 2071 (Montreal)

+1 204 272 7920 (Alberta)

+1 438 809 7799 (Ottawa)

+1 587 328 1099 (Toronto)

+1 647 374 4685 (Manitoba)

Meeting ID: 657 6738 4039

Passcode: 742580

Join from a videoconferencing system:

IP: 159.124.196.25 (Canada Vancouver) or 159.124.168.213 (Canada Toronto)

Meeting ID: 657 6738 4039

Passcode: 742580

SIP: 65767384039@vn.zmca.us

Passcode: 742580

Agenda

I. Call to Order

II. Territorial Acknowledgement 6:00 PM

III. Approval of the Agenda

Proposed motion:

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be adopted as presented."

A. Amendment of the Agenda

From the President

Motion to add business related to remuneration of Non-Executive Committee Chairs and

AMS Council minutes for approval dated February 12, 2025.

Proposed motion:

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be amended"

IV. Membership and Attendance: Introductions, New Members, Declaration of Vacancies6:02 PM

A. New Members

B. Vacancies

GSS, Medicine, Affiliates

C. Goodbyes

V. Speaker's Business and Remarks 6:03 PM

Presenter: Rowan Bapty

VI. Statements from Students-at-Large 6:04 PM

Statement from student-at-large - 3 minutes

Response from Councillors - 3 minutes

Closing remarks from student-at-large - 1 minute

Note: Up to three students at large may address Council.

VII. Approval of Minutes of Council and Committees

Proposed motion:

BE IT RESOLVED THAT the following minutes be accepted as presented:

External Briefs & Communications Committee:

• May 30, 2025

Building Operations Committee:

• May 30, 2025

Executive Committee:

• May 13, 2025

• May 20, 2025

AMS Council:

• January 22, 2025

• February 5, 2025

• February 12, 2025 (agenda amendment)

AMS Council (In Camera):

• December 4, 2024

• January 15, 2025

• January 22, 2025

• February 5, 2025

• February 12, 2025

• February 26, 2025

AMS Council (In Camera - EPA):

• October 30, 2024

• December 4, 2024

• January 22, 2025

• February 5, 2025

VIII. Consent Items

A. Consent Items Requiring a Simple Majority

B. Consent Items Requiring a Two-Thirds Majority

IX. Presentations and Accompanying Motions

A. Preliminary Executive Goals Presentation 6:25 PM

Presenters: Riley Huntley, Zarifa Nawar, Dylan Evans (he/him/his), Gagan Parmar, Solomon Yi-Kieran, Kevin

Heieis

30-minute presentation by the AMS Executive, accompanying preliminary executive goals document will be provided at the time of the presentation.

B. Recommendation for New Clubs Intake Suspension and Clubs Cap 7:10 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

BE IT RESOLVED THAT AMS Council, on the recommendation of the Clubs and Societies

Committee, suspend the intake of all new clubs effective immediately and impose a maximum club limit of three hundred and fifty (350) clubs indefinitely.

BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT Code Section V, Article 12(4)(b) be suspended to permit this.

Note: Requires 2/3rds

C. University Endowment Lands Housing Brief 7:30 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

From External Briefs and Communications Committee:

Proposed motion:

BE IT RESOLVED THAT AMS Council approve the University Endowment Lands Area D

Consultation: Housing Policy Recommendations brief.

Presentation

D. UBCx Skytrain Advocacy Presentation 7:40 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

From External Briefs and Communications Committee

Proposed motion:

BE IT RESOLVED THAT AMS Council approve the distribution of a UBCx petition as part of a

UBC Skytrain Advocacy campaign.

Presentation

X. Executive and Committee Motions

A. Student At Large Committee Appointments 7:50 PM

From the Executive Committee

Proposed motions (placeholder):

BE IT RESOLVED THAT (1 Student At Large member and 1 non-Executive Councilor) be appointed to the Human Resources Committee for a period effective immediately and ending at the first Council meeting in September 2025.

BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT (1 Student At Large member) be appointed to the Finance

Committee for a period effective immediately and ending at the first Council meeting in

September 2025.

BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT (1 Student At Large member) be appointed to the

Governance Committee for a period effective immediately and ending at the first Council meeting in September 2025.

BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT (2 Student At Large members) be appointed to the Building

Operations Committee for a period effective immediately and ending at the first Council meeting in September 2025.

Committees were delegated authority to shortlist and recommend appointees for their respective committees; these recommendations will be provided at Council.

B. Agenda Amendment: Non-Executive Committee Chair Remuneration

From the Human Resources & Governance Committees

Proposed motion:

WHEREAS AMS Council approved in April 2025 increases in the allocated wages for student staff, including non-executive chairs, in the 2025-2026 Preliminary Budget by $1.00 per hour.

WHEREAS AMS Bylaws & Code requires resolution of Council to increase remuneration for

Directors of the Society and Non-Executive Chairs are remunerated for 3 hours of service per week.

WHEREAS AMS Code requires a recommendation be provided both by Human Resources

Committee (for Events & Governance Committee) and by Governance Committee (for

Human Resources Committee).

BE IT RESOLVED THAT AMS Council, on the recommendation of the Human Resources &

Governance Committees, increase remuneration for Non-Executive Chairs of Standing

Committees from $18.50 to $19.50 per hour effective the first meeting of AMS Council in

May 2025.

C. AMS Nest Lease - Hair Saloon 8:10 PM

Presenter: Justin Lieu

From the Executive Committee

Proposed motion:

BE IT RESOLVED THAT AMS Council approve the lease for the Hair Salon.

Note: Requires 2/3rds

XI. Constituency and Affiliate Motions

XII. Discussions and Consultation

XIII. President's Business and Remarks 8:15 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 5 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XIV. Executive Business and Remarks

A. VP Academic & University Affairs 8:20 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. VP Administration 8:23 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. VP External Affairs 8:26 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. VP Finance 8:29 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. VP Student Life 8:32 PM

Presenter: Kevin Heieis

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Managing Director 8:35 PM

Presenter: Justin Lieu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Senior Manager of Student Services 8:38 PM

Presenter: Kathleen Simpson

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XV. Committee Reports (3 minutes each)

A. Building Operations Committee 8:41 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. Clubs and Societies Committee 8:44 PM

Presenter: Dylan Evans (he/him/his)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. Events Committee 8:47 PM

Presenter: Humleen Samra

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. External Briefs and Communications Committee 8:50 PM

Presenter: Solomon Yi-Kieran

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Finance Committee 8:53 PM

Presenter: Gagan Parmar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Governance Committee 8:56 PM

Presenter: Sarah Wong

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Human Resources Committee 8:59 PM

Presenter: Mya Tsai

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

H. Executive Performance and Accountability Committee (EPA) 9:02 PM

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVI. Report from Presidents' Council 9:05 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVII. Board of Governors, Senate, & Ombudsperson Reports

A. Board of Governors 9:08 PM

Presenters: Cade Desjarlais, Jasper Lorien

B. Senate 9:11 PM

Presenter: Jasper Lorien

C. Ombudsperson

Presenter: Noah Mossey

XVIII. Historical Update 9:14 PM

Presenter: Sheldon Goldfarb

XIX. Other Business, Including In Camera Discussions, Notices of Motions and Submissions

A. Code Suspension: Student Government Staff - Office of the VP Student Life 9:24 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

From the President

Proposed motion:

BE IT RESOLVED THAT AMS Council suspend Code of Procedure Section IX C, Article 2(8)(b).

BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED THAT AMS Council delegate authority to HR Committee for approval of job descriptions for student government staff in the Office of the Vice President

Student Life.

Note: Requires 2/3rds

B. In Camera Session

1. VP Student Life Commitments 9:29 PM

Presenter: Kevin Heieis

BE IT RESOLVED that the VP Student Life's updated commitments be accepted as presented.

2. Executive Performance & Accountability Session - Monthly (Routine) 9:44 PM

XX. Next Meeting and Adjournment

Next Council meeting time and date: 6:00 pm on July 2, 2025.

Supporting Documents
